name: Early Game Additions
description: Adds content to add depth to the early game. Made for use in modpacks
extendedDescription:
# 🌳 Early Game Additions
is a mod that adds content for modpack developers to use to add depth to their early game!

### IMPORTANT!
This mod was originally made for the **Cognata** modpack, so its _original_ recipes require items from mods such as Create, Farmer's Delight and Twigs. However, these are marked as _optional_ dependencies because modpack developers can use datapacks or tools like CraftTweaker to change these recipes for their own.

## 🗒️ Content
- Three stages of tree tap items (crude wood, copper, iron)
- New crude wooden axe and shovel craftable in the inventory
- Sap and Pitch Glue
- A few extra advancements for vanilla and create (advancement for diamond pickaxe, crafting table, wooden pickaxe, etc) to supplement a slower rate of progression
- Blowtorch

You can use this mod in your modpacks!
